title: Switched Phones Recently, Now I'm No Longer Part of the Beta?
body:
I recently upgraded my phone from an old Motorola Razr M to a Droid Turbo 2. Everything worked fine on the app prior to the switch, but now when I boot up the app and log in on my new phone, it says: 

Beta Access Required
To use this app your account needs beta access.

I also got another email earlier, asking me to be a beta tester for the app (again). Any reason behind this odd glitch?

replies.body:
Hey Inept77,
Thanks for the report. This should be fixed now, but you'll need to sign out and back into the app for it to function. Thanks for your help testing and let us know if there are any other issues!
